3.Dialogue:
While writing dialogues use
[bb_code_name] Text [/bb_code_name]

Example:
Put u in place of bb_code_name
[u]Text[/u]
3.Speaker: Fred

4.Dialogue:
Here's some more examples

[ [s] s [/s] ]

[ [color=red] color=red [/color]]

[ [shake] shake [/shake] ]

[ [wave] wave [/wave] ]

[ [tornado] tornado [/tornado] ]

[ [rainbow] rainbow [/rainbow] ]
4.Speaker: Fred
